pages.text: Every time you want to enter the realm of the Endermen, you have to travel half a world. Whoever created the portals to the End... you're so much more powerful than they are now.$(br2)Well, almost. Probably.$(br)You still haven't figured out how to create such portals yourself, but packing them up and taking them home? $(italic)No problem.
The End Portal, like found in Strongholds.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Due to the extremely sturdy portal frames, these can be quite destructive. It is best to keep a bit of distance after socketing.

pages.name: Reconstructed Portal
pages.text: You just put the portal back together the way it was, add Eyes of Ender, done!
